name: Mortar-Tube
description: A long hollow tube, closed at one end, it's almost as tall as you are and pretty heavy.

name: Base-Plate
description: A flat, round, metal circle with spikes on the bottom. This anchors the mortar tube to the ground.

name: Bipod
description: A metal contraption with two extendable legs, this keeps the mortar tube stationary.

name: ammo
description: A football shaped green object with a tail and bright yellow letting on the side.

name: Cheese-Charge
description: A 'C' shaped puffy little donut, this can be placed on the tail of a mortar round to give extra power.

name: Cheese
description: Strong smelling and yellow, it more closely resembles plastic than something edible.

name: CopenHagen-Wintergreen
description: A nice moist can of delicious snuff, this could come in handy
